message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it's worth a significant amount, and I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
